key_risks: Regulatory and legal risks due to operating in highly regulated industries
Market volatility impacting asset management and investment activities
Dependence on niche markets limiting revenue diversification
Integration risks from recent acquisitions and expansions
Potential tax compliance issues highlighted by deferred tax liability
controversies: Involvement in legal disputes such as Kasselakis v. Tiptree Inc. and Silver Leaf Partners, LLC v. Tiptree Inc.
Ethical and legal controversies identified by Sustainalytics
social_issues: Potential reputational damage from ethical controversies
governance_issues: Corporate governance issues highlighted by legal disputes
Operational limits imposed by exemption under the 1940 Act
